fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Your life is everything. You serve all purpose.**: if KYS (4262) is targeted, their abilities are replaced with yours, you two can both with with town or mafia, have a private chat, and cannot target each other.
- **Give yourself a piece of that oxygen in the ozone layer**: increases someone's (not yourself) defence level by one for two nights (cant go above invincible)
- **Im here for YOU. Love yourself! I mean that 100%, 1000%**: redirect attacks from target to yourself

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- can only spawn in games with KYS (4262)
- <https://youtu.be/KWrFdEhyKjg?si=3KO2p75Ac9bWsInJ>
